thread.section_title: Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: May not be suitable for people over Medium in size
thread.title_full: May not be suitable for people over Medium in size - Review of Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mustafa O
title: May not be suitable for people over Medium in size
text:
The location of the hotel is excellent for touristic purposes in Paris. The hotel is clean and the frontdesk is friendly. Didn't take breakfast because there are a lot of better and cheaper choices outside. The room is small but was OK for us because we only used it for staying at night. The room is clean. Looking out of the window only a bit of sky was seen. To see the street, you have to pay more I suppose. There is a telephone, TV and a kettle in the room. The toilet is small but the shower cabin is only for persons of medium size or below. If you are size Large you won't be able to fit in and take a shower. As for the towels, doesn't cover your head or body even if you are medium size. All in all clean and in the center of the city very close to touristic places.
Room Tip: Rooms ending with 7 are small and have very small shower cabin. Mine was 407 See more room tips
